page.title: 19MISS BRADER REMEMBERS
page.content: Miss Brader was born in Hemingby more than eighty years ago.Her father and grandfather were also born in Hemingby .She has lived there all her life. Miss Braders father was Hemingbys boot maker eighty years ago.His shop was joined onto his house which made it easier to get to work each day.The shop with its tiny windows is still there.It is now used as miss Braders garden store where she keeps everything for the garden. There was also a blacksmith in Hemingby.The blacksmiths shop is still there today but it has now been made into a garage where you park your car. Miss Brader has still got her fathers old school books with his copper plate writing and one page is concerned with writing practice .He wrote "liberality is laudable,"which means freedom is praise worthy.He also
